attributes.action: Scrap NI Contribution for Tier 2 ICT Visa as this route has been closed for settlement
attributes.additional_details: UK settlement has been closed for those in Tier 2 ICT visa since April 10. Anyone with a Tier 2 ICT visa granted after April 2010 shall not be eligible for settlement in UK after completion of five years. Also there is no provision for this NI contribution to be transferred to source country after the completion of 5 years. Hence requesting Home Office to Scrap NI contributions for the same.
